name: MeshMaterial
description: Allows you to adjust material properties of 3D objects.

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of all materials (default is white).
eventsFunctions.name: Color
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the color of _PARAM1_ materials to _PARAM2_

inlineCode: console.log('Color property does not exist for this material type.');

eventsFunctions.name: Opacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the opacity of _PARAM1_ materials to _PARAM2_

inlineCode: console.log('Opacity property does not exist for this material type.');

eventsFunctions.description:
Change reflectivity by material slot.
How much the environment map affects the surface, default is 1 valid range is between 0 no reflections and 1 full reflections.
eventsFunctions.name: ReflectivityBySlot
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the roughness of _PARAM1_ material in slot _PARAM3_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description:
Change bump scale by material slot.
How much the bump map affects the material (Typical ranges are 0-1 Default is 1).
eventsFunctions.name: BumpScaleBySlot
